data.name: Sumire - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Sumire - Original Soundtrack

The official OST of Sumire, containing 30(+1) beautiful tracks composed by Japanese acoustic band TOW.

Take an auditory journey through Sumire's day, colored with nostalgic acoustic sound, Japanese instruments, and soothing vocals.

Minimum:
